titleStmt.title: John Y. Wallace to James F. Robinson
CWG7940

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Edmunton Metcalfe County Ky
March 13". 1863
To his Excellency J F Robinson.

Your excellency is hereby informed of the death of W E Spindle Esq. an acting Justice of the peace for District No. Four of Metcalfe ^County,^ and I would respectfully recommend that you appoint and commission Lucien Knight Esq. of said county to fill the vacancy occasioned by said death.

Yours Respectfully
Jno. Y. Wallace Judge
Metcalfe County Court

Metcalfe Co
Justice of Peace for Metcalf County
Issue Comn
Lucien Knight
J. P.. Dist No 4.
Issd April 28. 1863.
